title: Nevves from sea, of tvvo notorious pyrats Ward the Englishman, and Danseker the Dutchman VVith a true relation of all or the most piraces [sic] by them committed vnto the sixt of Aprill. 1609.
author: Nixon, Anthony, attributed name.
publicationStmtPublisher: [By Edward Allde] for N. Butter and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the pide Bull,
